page.title: 02GENERAL INFORMATION
page.content: Magherafelt is a market town with a population of approximately 6000 inhabitants. It dominates the surrounding area which is mainly rural with a number of small farms. The central part of the town contains a cinema,shops,banks,offices,churches and car parks. The council offices and library are in Queen's Avenue and nearby there is the Greenvale Leisure Centre. Buildings of historical interest in Magherafelt include the Courthouse,the old Bridewell and the ruins of the former parish church.The town also has a hospital,a health clinic,a special care school,old people's shelters dwellings,nine churches and eight schools.
